name: Eldheist (Prototype)
description:
This is a prototype for Eldheist. What started as a chool project, has become a pet project of mine. Updates coming soon!

Any feedback is accepted, and will be taken into consideration for further development.

_____________________________________________________________________________________

In this game, you play as a thief who has stolen a Pocket Dimension from an Eldritch God, incurring their wrath.

NOTE: Your guns run on mana, not ammo. Run over a gun in the Pocket Dimension to swap it with your current gun. Guns in the Pocket Dimension restore mana over time.

Controls:
Movement:
W/A/S/D to Run
Shift to Dash
Control to Slide
Hold W or D in direction of wall, while pressing W to Wall-Run

Gunplay:
Right Click to Shoot
Left Click to Slow Your Fall
2 to Switch Guns

Other:
E to Deploy Pocket Dimension

Alt+F4 to Quit (Sorry about this one)
